# value(forKey:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an array containing the results of invoking [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/value(forKey:)] using `key` on each of the array’s objects.

## Declaration

```swift
func value(forKey key: String) -> Any
```

## Parameters

- **key**: The key to retrieve.

## Return Value

The value of the retrieved key.

## Discussion

The returned array contains `NSNull` elements for each object that returns `nil`.

## Key-Value Coding

- **setValue(_:forKey:)**: Invokes [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/setValue(_:forKey:)] on each of the array’s items using the specified `value` and `key`.
